text: Reach: Motion of the hand-arm-system without load
label: Reach

text: Move: Move handling of a load
label: Move

text: Insert/Remove: Change of the position of a part in relation to a reference coordinate system
label: Insert/Remove

text: Screw/Unscrew: Rotation of the hand-arm system along a fixed axis
label: Screw/Unscrew

text: Relocate: Repositioning of the worker/robot in space
label: Relocate

text: Grasp: Indicates that the gripper of a robot or the hand of human worker holds an object
label: Grasp

text: Release: The gripper of a robot or the hand of human worker is free
label: Release

text: Pick: Pick up a tool from a tool magazine
label: Pick

text: Return: Return of a tool into a tool magazine
label: Return

text: Calibrate: Robot must be calibrated at its current position or a human worker has to orientate himself at the working place
label: Calibrate

text: Vision: Automated recognizing, identifying, localizing objects
label: Vision

text: Follow: Mirroring of other movements in general
label: Follow

text: Balance: Hold the position within the current circumstances
label: Balance

text: Record: Recording a path, e.g. during teaching (special case of follow)
label: Record

text: Teach: Information exchange form the senior human worker to the novice/robots
label: Teach

text: Communicate: Information exchange between two or more workers/robots
label: Communicate

text: Time Delay: Wait while the other partner performs an action
label: Time Delay
